abstract: Growing up in a big family.
description: Hamish Eden is only thirteen, he is uncle to three nephews and a niece. He comes from a large family of twelve but Hamish shares the benefits of having so many brothers and sisters. They have been great rolemodels to Hamish and have taught him many different things, above all the importance of education.
